name: node
description: * node.js is a sqynchronous javascript runtime environmanr that executes javascript code outside of a browser. * **npm** Node Package Manager, is the default package manager for Node.js. It is distributed with Node.js, which means that when you download Node.js, npm is automatically installed on your computer! * **inquirer** is an embeddable command-line interface for Node.js that makes it easy to ask questions, validate answers, parse input, provide error feedback, and manage hierarchical prompts.
